task.title: Navigating the Calendar
task.shortdesc: Learn how to access and view the calendar feature in Noter.app.

context.p: This procedure explains how to open the calendar within Noter.app and view its basic layout.

substep.cmd: In the Sidebar, locate and click the "Calendar" icon (refer to the Interface Overview for its location).
substep.info: - This action opens the calendar view in the main Note Editor Pane.

step.info: - The calendar displays the current month by default.
- To view other months, use the navigation arrows ("<" and ">") located near the top of the calendar.
- Click on a specific day to view any notes, tasks, or scheduled events for that day.
- Some calendars may offer different views (day, week, month). Look for view options, represented by icons or tabs (e.g., "Day," "Week," "Month").

taskbody.result: You are now viewing the Noter.app calendar. You can browse different months and days and view any associated notes or tasks.
